name: Trial Of Colors
description:
CONTROLS: (Disclaimer: this game was made with mainly a controller in mind!)

WASD = move

Mouse = rotate

Shift = fly

Space = sprint

====================

Left joystick = move

Right joystick = rotate

Left trigger = fly

Right trigger = sprint

Want to see it in action first?


A new semester means a new series of videos covering games I am developing at school (and maybe also in my free if I will have some).

Trail Of Colors is a 3D platformer with a focus on flying. You control the three primary colors who need to earn their right to be colors.

To make sure they succeed, you fly them through their respective rings. Every color leaves a color trail and as you fly your way through the rings, you need to avoid the trail left by the other colors.

 If you like what you see, feel free to drop a like and if you like my other content as well, consider subscribing to the channel as the new semester has just begun!
